item.title: Learning Chess
item.description: So a while ago after being absolutely destroyed by a friend in a game of chess, I decided to actually learn the game. What’s chess? Chess is a popular game of strategy where two players play against each other. It involves a chess board containing 64 squares and 16 pieces on each side. The players have a pair of rooks, bishops and knights. They also have eight pawns, a queen and a king.
